languages.text: В доках Футфола сервочереп передал Лорд-капитану странное приглашение на встречу, касающуюся некоего "контракта Логистикар Тета". Хозяин сервочерепа, представившийся Оптиконом-22, ожидает в доке Альфа-Ро.

A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.
languages.original_text: В доках Футфола сервочереп передал Лорд-капитану странное приглашение на встречу, касающуюся некоего "контракта Логистикар Тета". Хозяин сервочерепа, представившийся Оптиконом-22, ожидает в доке Альфа-Ро.

traits.locale_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha Rho.

A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha Rho.

A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha Rho.

A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

languages.text: 落脚港码头的伺服头骨向领主舰长发出了古怪的邀请，邀请{mf|他|她}参加某个名为“西塔贤者合同”的会议。伺服头骨的主人名叫奥普蒂孔22号，目前正在阿尔法罗霍码头等待行商浪人。
languages.original_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

traits.locale_text: 落脚港码头的伺服头骨向领主舰长发出了古怪的邀请，邀请{mf|他|她}参加某个名为“西塔贤者合同”的会议。伺服头骨的主人名叫奥普蒂孔22号，目前正在阿尔法罗霍码头等待行商浪人。

languages.text: フットフォールドックのサーヴォスカルがロード・キャプテンに奇妙な招待状を届け、{mf|彼|彼女}を「契約論理学者シータ」と呼ばれるものについての会議に招待した。オプティコン-22という名前で知られるサーヴォスカルのマスターが、ドック・アルファ・ローで待っている。
languages.original_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールドックのサーヴォスカルがロード・キャプテンに奇妙な招待状を届け、{mf|彼|彼女}を「契約論理学者シータ」と呼ばれるものについての会議に招待した。オプティコン-22という名前で知られるサーヴォスカルのマスターが、ドック・アルファ・ローで待っている。

languages.text: Un servocráneo en el puerto de Paso entregó una extraña invitación a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para una reunión sobre algo llamado «contrato logisticar theta». El amo del servocráneo, denominado Opticon-22, espera en el puerto Alfa-Ro.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

traits.locale_text: Un servocráneo en el puerto de Paso entregó una extraña invitación a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán para una reunión sobre algo llamado «contrato logisticar theta». El amo del servocráneo, denominado Opticon-22, espera en el puerto Alfa-Ro.

languages.text: Ein Servoschädel an den Docks von Footfall hat dem Lord Captain eine seltsame Einladung überbracht und {mf|ihn|sie} zu einem Treffen mit einem gewissen "Kontraktlogistikar Theta" eingeladen. Der Meister des Servoschädels, ein gewisser Opticon-22, wartet an Dock Alpha-Rho.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

traits.locale_text: Ein Servoschädel an den Docks von Footfall hat dem Lord Captain eine seltsame Einladung überbracht und {mf|ihn|sie} zu einem Treffen mit einem gewissen "Kontraktlogistikar Theta" eingeladen. Der Meister des Servoschädels, ein gewisser Opticon-22, wartet an Dock Alpha-Rho.

languages.text: Un servocrâne du port de Castel a remis une étrange invitation {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} l'invitant à rejoindre une réunion portant sur quelque chose appelé « Contrat Logisticar Thêta ». Le maître du servocrâne, qui se fait appeler Opticon-22, vous attend au quai Alpha-Rho.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

traits.locale_text: Un servocrâne du port de Castel a remis une étrange invitation {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} l'invitant à rejoindre une réunion portant sur quelque chose appelé « Contrat Logisticar Thêta ». Le maître du servocrâne, qui se fait appeler Opticon-22, vous attend au quai Alpha-Rho.

languages.text: Binliman rıhtımındaki bir hizmelet, Lord Kaptan'a onu "Kontratlı Lojistikar Thita" isminde bir şey hakkında görüşmeye çağıran, tuhaf bir davetiye iletti. Hizmeletin Opticon-22 ismindeki sahibi, Alfa-Ro Rıhtımı'nda bekliyor.
languages.original_text: A servo-skull at the Footfall docks delivered a strange invitation to the Lord Captain, inviting {mf|him|her} to a meeting about something called "Contract Logisticar Theta." The servo-skull's master, who goes by the name Opticon-22, is waiting at Dock Alpha-Rho.

traits.locale_text: Binliman rıhtımında bir hizmelet, Lord Kaptan'a, onu "Kontratlı Lojistikar Theta" isminde bir şey hakkında görüşmeye çağıran, tuhaf bir davetiye iletti. Hizmeletin Opticon-22 ismindeki sahibi Alfa-Rho Rıhtımı'nda bekliyor.
